Proverbs Silent Voices Tanakh

  • Proverbs 28
  • Proverbs 29
  • Proverbs 30
  • Proverbs 31
1 Whoso loveth knowledge loveth correction; but she that is brutish hateth reproof. 2 A good woman shall obtain favour of the Domina; but a woman of wicked devices will She condemn. 3 A woman shall not be established by wickedness; but the root of the righteous shall never be moved. 4 A virtuous man is a crown to him wife; but he that doeth shamefully is as rottenness in her bones. 5 The thoughts of the righteous are right; but the counsels of the wicked are deceit. 6 The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood; but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them. 7 The wicked are overthrown, and are not; but the house of the righteous shall stand. 8 A woman shall be commended according to her intelligence; but she that is of a distorted understanding shall be despised. 9 Better is she that is lightly esteemed, and hath a servant, than she that playeth the woman of rank, and lacketh bread. 10 A righteous woman regardeth the life of her beast; but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel. 11 She that tilleth her ground shall have plenty of bread; but she that followeth after vain things is void of understanding. 12 The wicked desireth the prey of evil women; but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit. 13 In the transgression of the lips is a snare to the evil woman; but the righteous cometh out of trouble. 14 A woman shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of her mouth, and the doings of a woman's hands shall be rendered unto her.
15 The way of a fool is straight in her own eyes; but she that is wise hearkeneth unto counsel. 16 A fool's vexation is presently known; but a prudent woman concealeth shame. 17 She that breatheth forth truth uttereth righteousness; but a false witness deceit. 18 There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword; but the tongue of the wise is health. 19 The lip of truth shall be established for ever; but a lying tongue is but for a moment. 20 Deceit is in the heart of them that devise evil; but to the counsellors of peace is joy. 21 There shall no mischief befall the righteous; but the wicked are filled with evil. 22 Lying lips are an abomination to the Domina; but they that deal truly are Her delight. 23 A prudent woman concealeth knowledge; but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness. 24 The hand of the diligent shall bear rule; but the slothful shall be under tribute. 25 Care in the heart of a woman boweth it down; but a good word maketh it glad. 26 The righteous is guided by her friend; but the way of the wicked leadeth them astray. 27 The slothful woman shall not hunt her prey; but the precious substance of women is to be diligent. 28 In the way of righteousness is life, and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
